results.content:
I am rating myself more than the course, which is paced for someone with more knowledge.

It's good in that it is beyond my comprehension except for certain things I partially understand. Challenging but clear.

It may take several viewings and more JavaScript lessons before I grasp more of it.

But it will be worth it, and I hope to see more from this instructor who appears willing to immediately respond to questions and provide valuable advice.

He clearly knows what he's talking about and is able to prove it.

response.content: Thank you Les, I'm happy I could help
